sentences.sContent: Boats for hire: one shilling an hour.
sentences.sContent_eng: Boats for hire: one shilling an hour.
sentences.sCn: 游船出租： 每小时一先令。

sentences.sContent: The prominent coin was called the shilling and it was a silver coin.
sentences.sContent_eng: The prominent coin was called the shilling and it was a silver coin.
sentences.sCn: 那种著名的硬币名叫先令，并且它是一种银质的硬币。

sentences.sContent: The cost of borrowing abroad is likely to rise , the overvalued kenyan shilling will fall , tourism has already been badly hit and foreign aid may be cut back.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cost of borrowing abroad is likely to rise , the overvalued kenyan shilling will fall , tourism has already been badly hit and foreign aid may be cut back.
sentences.sCn: 从国外的贷款有可能会上升，而估价过高的肯尼亚先令也将贬值，旅游业已经受到重挫，国外援助可能也会减少。

trans.tranOther: an old British coin or unit of money. There were 20 shillings in one pound.
